TEI.2.document_title: Samuel Crawford to James F Perry, 04-14-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Samuel Crawford in account with James F. Perry, July 20, 1833.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 987

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel Crawford in account with James F. Perry, July 20, 1833.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel Crawford*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*James F Perry*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1833">1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-04-1833">Jany 4 */date_mentioned* To 1 Gall Pecans______________ 50 To Medz pr order____________________ 3. 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-14-1833">April 14*/date_mentioned* To 3 yds Domestic 25____________________________ 75 1 Handkf____________________ 38*/p* *p*$4 13*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Samuel Crawford*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Perry and Hunter*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1833">1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-20-1833">July 20 */date_mentioned* To Cash pd *person_mentioned*W. C. White and Co*/person_mentioned* for 1 BBL. whiskey______ Best. Damage not finishing his chimney__________ $25.87*/p*
*/div1*
